title: Does the police in Sweden no longer investigate cases of rape since the arrival of immigrants?
subtitle: The former leader of the British People's Party (Nigel Faraj) mentioned the location of the plot (Nvo Wars) in a tweet alleging that the police in Sweden had admitted that they were "no longer" investigating the rape.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Swedish police admitted that they no longer investigated rape since the arrival of immigrants.
